EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Building “Bootful” UIs with Spring Boot and Vaadin 7AM.Reminder 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Building “Bootful” UIs with Spring Boot and Vaadin
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We are looking forward to having you join us for the webinar Building “Bootful” UIs with Spring Boot and Vaadin. If you haven't done so yet, we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Thursday, October 23, 2014 Europe: 3:00pm BST (London, GMT+1) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=298595750> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 298 595 750 Thank you,
